label: [{"start":0,"end":5,"text":"喹乙醇中毒","labels":["disease"]},{"start":8,"end":11,"text":"喹乙醇","labels":["drug"]},{"start":18,"end":19,"text":"鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":20,"end":25,"text":"中毒性疾病","labels":["disease"]}]
text: 喹乙醇中毒是由于喹乙醇应用不当，造成鸡的中毒性疾病。

label: [{"start":0,"end":3,"text":"喹乙醇","labels":["drug"]},{"start":10,"end":13,"text":"快育诺","labels":["drug"]},{"start":14,"end":18,"text":"喹酰胺醇","labels":["drug"]},{"start":24,"end":26,"text":"鸡只","labels":["type"]},{"start":43,"end":47,"text":"大肠杆菌","labels":["disease"]},{"start":48,"end":52,"text":"沙门氏菌","labels":["disease"]},{"start":53,"end":60,"text":"金黄色葡萄球菌","labels":["disease"]},{"start":61,"end":65,"text":"绿脓杆菌","labels":["disease"]},{"start":84,"end":87,"text":"青霉素","labels":["drug"]},{"start":88,"end":92,"text":"庆大霉素","labels":["drug"]},{"start":93,"end":96,"text":"抗生素","labels":["drug"]}]
text: 喹乙醇就是平常所说的快育诺或喹酰胺醇，它具有促进鸡只生长发育、改善饲料转化率的作用，对大肠杆菌、沙门氏菌、金黄色葡萄球菌、绿脓杆菌等病原菌有较好的抑制作用，其抗菌活性比青霉素、庆大霉素等抗生素还好，是一种价格便宜，使用方便，不易产生抗药性，疗效较高的常用药。常因用药量大或搅拌不均匀造成中毒事故。

label: [{"start":0,"end":2,"text":"病鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":2,"end":6,"text":"食欲减少","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":10,"end":14,"text":"精神沉郁","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":15,"end":19,"text":"垂翅缩颈","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":20,"end":25,"text":"鸡冠黑紫色","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":22,"end":25,"text":"黑紫色","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":26,"end":33,"text":"排出黄白色稀粪","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":28,"end":31,"text":"黄白色","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":39,"end":41,"text":"痉挛","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":42,"end":46,"text":"角弓反张","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":67,"end":69,"text":"鸡群","labels":["type"]},{"start":49,"end":54,"text":"喹乙醇中毒","labels":["disease"]},{"start":32,"end":33,"text":"粪","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":16,"end":17,"text":"翅","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":18,"end":19,"text":"颈","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":20,"end":22,"text":"鸡冠","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 病鸡食欲减少或废绝，精神沉郁，垂翅缩颈，鸡冠黑紫色，排出黄白色稀粪，死前常见有痉挛或角弓反张现象；喹乙醇中毒康复率很低，曾有全群覆灭的鸡群。

label: [{"start":1,"end":6,"text":"败血症变化","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":10,"end":15,"text":"多处有出血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":20,"end":26,"text":"心冠脂肪充血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":24,"end":26,"text":"充血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":27,"end":33,"text":"十二指肠充血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":31,"end":33,"text":"充血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":34,"end":36,"text":"出血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":42,"end":46,"text":"盲肠充血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":44,"end":46,"text":"充血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":47,"end":49,"text":"出血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":53,"end":57,"text":"肾脏瘀血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":55,"end":57,"text":"瘀血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":58,"end":60,"text":"肿大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":20,"end":24,"text":"心冠脂肪","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":27,"end":31,"text":"十二指肠","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":39,"end":41,"text":"腺胃","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":42,"end":44,"text":"盲肠","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":50,"end":52,"text":"肝脏","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":53,"end":55,"text":"肾脏","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 以败血症变化为特征，多处有出血现象，可见心冠脂肪充血，十二指肠充血、出血，有时腺胃、盲肠充血、出血，肝脏、肾脏瘀血，肿大2～4倍。

label: [{"start":6,"end":14,"text":"严格控制用药剂量","labels":["control"]},{"start":25,"end":28,"text":"大群鸡","labels":["type"]}]
text: 以预防为主，严格控制用药剂量，避免计算错误，是防止大群鸡中毒的根本办法。

label: [{"start":0,"end":4,"text":"拌料均匀","labels":["control"]},{"start":9,"end":11,"text":"鸡只","labels":["type"]},{"start":34,"end":38,"text":"拌料浓度","labels":["control"]}]
text: 拌料均匀，避免个别鸡只摄入过量，其预防量掌握在0.01%～0.02%拌料浓度；

label: [{"start":22,"end":26,"text":"维生素C","labels":["drug"]},{"start":27,"end":30,"text":"多维素","labels":["drug"]},{"start":34,"end":37,"text":"喹乙醇","labels":["drug"]},{"start":38,"end":40,"text":"神经","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":41,"end":43,"text":"肝脏","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":17,"end":26,"text":"饲料中添加维生素C","labels":["control"]}]
text: 其治疗量应在0.03%~0.04%饲料中添加维生素C或多维素，以减轻喹乙醇对神经和肝脏的损害。

label: [{"start":0,"end":5,"text":"灌服白糖水","labels":["control"]}]
text: 灌服白糖水或绿豆汤可缓解毒性。

label: [{"start":0,"end":3,"text":"喹乙醇","labels":["drug"]},{"start":5,"end":9,"text":"喹酰胺醇","labels":["drug"]},{"start":10,"end":13,"text":"快育诺","labels":["drug"]},{"start":14,"end":17,"text":"倍育诺","labels":["drug"]},{"start":22,"end":25,"text":"促进剂","labels":["drug"]},{"start":26,"end":29,"text":"抗菌剂","labels":["drug"]}]
text: 喹乙醇又名喹酰胺醇、快育诺、倍育诺等，是一种促进剂和抗菌剂。

label: [{"start":52,"end":55,"text":"禽霍乱","labels":["disease"]}]
text: 由于其具有提高畜禽生长率、改善饲料转化率和抗菌作用，并有用量少、价格便宜、使用方便、不易产生耐药性及防治禽霍乱效果显著等特点，故在养禽业中有广泛的应用。但其用量过大或拌料不匀则可引起中毒。

label: [{"start":22,"end":25,"text":"喹乙醇","labels":["drug"]},{"start":46,"end":49,"text":"喹乙醇","labels":["drug"]},{"start":51,"end":58,"text":"家禽生长促进剂","labels":["drug"]},{"start":37,"end":40,"text":"添加剂","labels":["drug"]}]
text: 用量过大，或大剂量连续应用所致。常常因为使用喹乙醇含量较高的猪用全价饲料或添加剂而引起中毒，喹乙醇作为家禽生长促进剂，一般在饲料中加入25~30g/t。

label: [{"start":14,"end":17,"text":"禽霍乱","labels":["disease"]},{"start":30,"end":36,"text":"细菌性传染病","labels":["disease"]},{"start":51,"end":54,"text":"喹乙醇","labels":["drug"]}]
text: 饲料搅拌不匀或错误用量，预防禽霍乱等疾病时超量引起中毒。预防细菌性传染病，一般在饲料中添加100g/t喹乙醇，连用7天，停药7~10天。

label: [{"start":17,"end":20,"text":"喹乙醇","labels":["drug"]},{"start":51,"end":54,"text":"喹乙醇","labels":["drug"]},{"start":60,"end":61,"text":"鸡","labels":["type"]}]
text: 治疗量一般在饲料中添加200g/t喹乙醇，连用3~5天，停药7~10天。据报道，饲料中添加300g/t喹乙醇，饲喂6天，鸡就呈现中毒症状。

label: [{"start":12,"end":15,"text":"喹乙醇","labels":["drug"]},{"start":22,"end":24,"text":"蛋鸡","labels":["type"]}]
text: 饲料中添加1000g/t喹乙醇饲喂240日龄蛋鸡，第3天即出现中毒症状。

label: [{"start":0,"end":3,"text":"喹乙醇","labels":["drug"]},{"start":44,"end":47,"text":"速育灵","labels":["drug"]},{"start":48,"end":51,"text":"快育灵","labels":["drug"]},{"start":52,"end":55,"text":"霍乱灵","labels":["drug"]},{"start":56,"end":59,"text":"鸡病灵","labels":["drug"]},{"start":36,"end":39,"text":"喹乙醇","labels":["drug"]},{"start":4,"end":6,"text":"鸡体","labels":["type"]}]
text: 喹乙醇在鸡体内有较强的蓄积作用，小剂量连续应用，也会蓄积中毒，如使用含有喹乙醇的药品，如速育灵、快育灵、霍乱灵、鸡病灵等。

label: [{"start":0,"end":2,"text":"病鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":2,"end":4,"text":"厌食","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":5,"end":9,"text":"精神沉郁","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":10,"end":14,"text":"缩头嗜睡","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":15,"end":19,"text":"畏寒扎堆","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":20,"end":24,"text":"羽毛松乱","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":22,"end":24,"text":"松乱","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":25,"end":32,"text":"排黄色水样稀粪","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":26,"end":28,"text":"黄色","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":33,"end":39,"text":"鸡冠呈紫黑色","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":36,"end":39,"text":"紫黑色","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":40,"end":44,"text":"卧地不动","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":11,"end":12,"text":"头","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":20,"end":22,"text":"羽毛","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":31,"end":32,"text":"粪","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":33,"end":35,"text":"鸡冠","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 病鸡厌食，精神沉郁，缩头嗜睡，畏寒扎堆，羽毛松乱，排黄色水样稀粪。鸡冠呈紫黑色，卧地不动，很快死亡。

label: [{"start":34,"end":41,"text":"产蛋量急剧下降","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":44,"end":46,"text":"绝产","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":28,"end":31,"text":"产蛋鸡","labels":["type"]}]
text: 轻度中毒时，发病较迟缓。大剂量中毒时，可在数小时内发病。产蛋鸡中毒后产蛋量急剧下降，甚至绝产。

label: [{"start":5,"end":9,"text":"鸡新城疫","labels":["disease"]},{"start":10,"end":15,"text":"急性禽霍乱","labels":["disease"]},{"start":18,"end":23,"text":"消化道出血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":21,"end":23,"text":"出血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":38,"end":43,"text":"弥漫性出血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":48,"end":50,"text":"条状","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":51,"end":57,"text":"出血斑状出血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":64,"end":68,"text":"点状出血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":44,"end":50,"text":"腺胃出现条状","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":69,"end":84,"text":"腺胃与肌胃交界处有黑色的坏死区","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":78,"end":80,"text":"黑色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":81,"end":84,"text":"坏死区","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":18,"end":21,"text":"消化道","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":25,"end":29,"text":"十二指肠","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":30,"end":33,"text":"泄殖腔","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":44,"end":46,"text":"腺胃","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":69,"end":71,"text":"腺胃","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":72,"end":74,"text":"肌胃","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":58,"end":63,"text":"肌胃角质层","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 病理变化与鸡新城疫和急性禽霍乱相似。消化道出血尤以十二指肠、泄殖腔严重表现为弥漫性出血，腺胃出现条状或出血斑状出血，肌胃角质层下点状出血、腺胃与肌胃交界处有黑色的坏死区。

label: [{"start":11,"end":16,"text":"散在出血点","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":17,"end":21,"text":"心肌质软","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":19,"end":21,"text":"质软","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":22,"end":25,"text":"肝肿大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":23,"end":25,"text":"肿大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":26,"end":29,"text":"出血斑","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":30,"end":33,"text":"色暗红","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":34,"end":36,"text":"质脆","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":37,"end":43,"text":"切面糜烂多汁","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":46,"end":49,"text":"肾肿大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":47,"end":49,"text":"肿大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":50,"end":52,"text":"质脆","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":55,"end":60,"text":"肾一般肿大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":58,"end":60,"text":"肿大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":0,"end":5,"text":"心冠状脂肪","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":6,"end":8,"text":"心肌","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":17,"end":19,"text":"心肌","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":22,"end":23,"text":"肝","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":44,"end":45,"text":"脾","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":46,"end":47,"text":"肾","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":53,"end":54,"text":"肝","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":55,"end":56,"text":"肾","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 心冠状脂肪和心肌表面有散在出血点，心肌质软。肝肿大有出血斑，色暗红，质脆，切面糜烂多汁，脾、肾肿大，质脆。肝、肾一般肿大2~5倍。

label: [{"start":16,"end":19,"text":"添加剂","labels":["drug"]},{"start":36,"end":39,"text":"喹乙醇","labels":["drug"]},{"start":0,"end":8,"text":"按规定添加量应用","labels":["control"]}]
text: 按规定添加量应用。用作促进生长的添加剂时，每千克饲料中加25~35mg的喹乙醇，且要混匀；

label: [{"start":24,"end":27,"text":"喹乙醇","labels":["drug"]},{"start":53,"end":56,"text":"喹乙醇","labels":["drug"]},{"start":42,"end":48,"text":"立即更换饲料","labels":["control"]},{"start":49,"end":56,"text":"停止饲喂喹乙醇","labels":["control"]}]
text: 用作预防疾病时按每千克饲料中加50~100mg的喹乙醇，连用1周后，应停药3~5天。立即更换饲料，停止饲喂喹乙醇。

label: [{"start":17,"end":21,"text":"碳酸氢钠","labels":["drug"]},{"start":33,"end":38,"text":"葡萄糖溶液","labels":["drug"]},{"start":60,"end":65,"text":"复合维生素","labels":["drug"]},{"start":73,"end":76,"text":"百毒解","labels":["drug"]},{"start":0,"end":6,"text":"水中交替投入","labels":["control"]}]
text: 水中交替投入0.1%～0.15%的碳酸氢钠、6%～8%的白糖或5%葡萄糖溶液，连饮3~5天。也可投喂5~10倍营养需要的复合维生素，连饮3~5天。百毒解250g加25kg水，连饮3~5天。
